ModMetaData.name: Camping Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Nandonalt
ModMetaData.description:
v0.5.1 Camping Stuff Mod By Nandonalt (made compatible with b19 by Alias): Adds Deployable Tents(Normal, Medium, Big, and Long) and Portable Stoves.
Changelog: v5.1- Fixed portable stoves not being portable v5.0- b19 support, removed butchering spots, support for arbitrary tent sizes, new tent size: long v4.0- b18 support, removed sleeping bags v3.0- a17 support v2.0- enables you to make tents from any textile and adds two new sizes to tents: medium and big.
